short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to reopen saved tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you leave for the day in middle of the work, you have to reopen all the tabs you were working on again next day. To save time and effort, you can simply save all your tabs and reopen it next day so you can continue your work  where you left off.
